:: Hydras ::

A cruel grin creeped across Hydras face as he listened intently to 
the audio synth that Maxima had made. He clenched his right fist 
with eagerness; he wanted to do it again. 

"Rodimus, know this: Nigh--" He stops cracking another evilish 
grin, "Blackstorm is of no consequence. Whether she lives or dies 
matters not. Your eminent destruction comes, preparing for it will 
only further your suffering. Hydras out." As he closes the comm 
line, a deep laugh rumbles from Hydras.

"Well done Maxima." He places his hand on her shoulder. "Now we must 
plan to use Blackstorm to lure Rodimus out so we can destroy him."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maximadid as was asked, without question or looking at Hydras. 
> 
> Touching a few buttons, then within a second was Nightlight's 
voice & some 
> torturing moments. Not screams much, but some slight noticing 
moments of pain... 
> as well as the moment she was reprogrammed into Blackstorm... & 
Perceptor's 
> little informative reprogramming of who she was. & her 
acknowledgement of she 
> being Blackstorm & no longer Nightlight. There was no mention.. of 
Nightlight. 
> Just... Blackstorm. 
> 
> Her crimson optics glanced up to Rodimus & a wicked smirk cracked 
her face. 
> Oh, she was enjoying this. The more torture for him, the better.
